heroSubtitle: Your authentic adventure awaits you on the red island.
whyMadagascarSubtitle: Discover the continent island of a thousand wonders, a unique biodiversity sanctuary in the world
biodiversityDesc: Madagascar hosts 5% of the world's biodiversity on less than 0.4% of emerged lands. A true laboratory of evolution.
cultureDesc: 18 Malagasy ethnic groups with millenary traditions, unique craftsmanship and legendary hospitality await you.
landscapeDesc: From limestone Tsingy to baobab avenues, through high plateaus and primary forests.
wildlifeDesc: Lemurs, fossas, chameleons... Unique fauna shaped by 165 million years of isolation.
beachDesc: 5000 km of preserved coastlines, turquoise lagoons, coral reefs and white sand beaches.
adventureDesc: Trekking, diving, wildlife watching... Unforgettable experiences off the beaten path.
madagascarQuote: Madagascar is not Africa, Madagascar is Madagascar.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Founded in 2008 by a team of passionate Malagasy and French individuals, Show Me Mada was born from a simple dream: to share the exceptional beauty of Madagascar with the entire world.
ourStory.paragraph2: What started as a small local agency has today become one of the leading players in responsible tourism in Madagascar. Our secret? An intimate knowledge of the terrain, privileged relationships with local communities, and a contagious passion for our island.
ourStory.paragraph3: Every trip we organize is the result of our expertise accumulated over the years and our unwavering commitment to tourism that respects the environment and local populations.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide each of our actions and make the difference in your travels

responsibleTourism.title: Responsible Tourism
responsibleTourism.description: We are committed to preserving Madagascar's unique biodiversity and supporting local communities through respectful and sustainable tourism.

excellence.title: Excellence & Authenticity
excellence.description: Every detail matters. We create authentic and memorable experiences by prioritizing quality over quantity in all our services.

expertise.title: Local Expertise
expertise.description: Our passionate Malagasy team shares with you the hidden secrets of the island, off the beaten path, for unique and privileged discoveries.

trust.title: Trust Relationship
trust.description: Transparency, listening and responsiveness are at the heart of our client relationship. We accompany you before, during and after your trip.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: A multicultural and experienced team, united by the same passion for Madagascar and the desire to offer you unforgettable experiences
